song:
Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Jaya Shankara
Hara Hara Shankara Palayamam
Shankara Guruvey Saranam Saranam Mangala Nayaka Saranam Saranam
Shiva Roopey Mama Saranam Saranam Shakthi Roopey Mama Saranam Saranam
Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Jaya Shankara Hara Hara Shankara Palayamam
Vishnu Roopey Mama Saranam Saranam Lakshmi Roopey Mama Saranam Saranam
Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Jaya Shankara
Hara Hara Shankara Palayamam
Brahma Roopey Mama Saranam Saranam
Saraswathi Roopey Saranam Saranam
Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Jaya Shankara
Hara Hara Shankara Palayamam
Ganapathy Roopey Saranam Saranam Shanmuga Roopey Saranam Saranam
Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Jaya Shankara
Hara Hara Shankara Palayamam
Sri Soorya Murthey Saranam Saranam Sri Chakra Roopey Saranam Saranam
Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Jaya Shankara
Hara Hara Shankara Palayamam.
Dakshinamurthaye Saranam Saranam
Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Jaya Shankara Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Jaya Shankara
Hara Hara Shankara Palayamam
Hara Hara Shankara Kamatchi Shankara Jaya Jaya Shankara Kanchi Shankara
Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Jaya Shankara
Hara Hara Shankara Palayamam
Hara Hara Sankara Kaladi Shankara

Hara Hara Shankara Palayamam
Hara Hara Shakara Jaya Jaya Shankara Hara Hara Shankara Palayamam
Shankara Guruvey Saranam Saranam Mangala Nayaka Saranam Saranam
Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Jaya Shankara Hara Hara Shankara Palayamam

Hara Hara Shankara Palayamam
